        public java.lang.String getCustomerId()
        The customer to who this Cart or Order belongs. Can be empty if the customer hasn't registered yet.

      • getCustomerEmail

        public java.lang.String getCustomerEmail()
        The email of the anonymous customer to who this Cart or Order belongs. This field is intended for the case when the customer completes a checkout without registration, only providing email and shipping address.

      • getCustomerGroup

        @Nonnull
public Reference<CustomerGroup> getCustomerGroup()

        The currency.

      • getTaxedPrice

        public TaxedPrice getTaxedPrice()
        The taxed total price, defined only when the shipping address is set. Tax rates are determined by the backend based on the country and state of the shipping address.

      • getCountry

        public com.neovisionaries.i18n.CountryCode getCountry()
        The country used for price calculations. Optional.
